Articles.Content:
really at this point, they might as well have just started the forums from scratch. there's no threads from the backup that would be considered worth saving, and only serves to clutter the forums into the future.

people often search older threads for info, but this backup is soooo old, it's worthless to have because all the threads are nowhere near applicable to any recent versions.

Edited April 19, 2013 by trekkie_
Least I didn't lose anything meaningful. Haven't been too active on the forums.
^ Ya but that would probably mean wiping everyones account too. Dunno how it works so I may be wrong.

OMG

I am a newbie again, I really hate these moments ...

Yep

I tried re-registering with the same name, but it said that that name was already in use.

So I did the account recovery thingy, managed to log into my old account, only to find that everything on it was wiped .

I also lost the big FTL poll thread I created .
This event has not only erased enormous amounts of data, it has also created three distinct member types: elders, reborns and newcomers.

This event has not only erased enormous amounts of data, it has also created three distinct member types: elders, reborns and newcomers.

Yay, I'm an elder! And so are you! High five!

OMG

I am a newbie again, I really hate these moments ...

Being a newbie is not defined by your post count. Besides, you are a reborn, which is a pretty cool title.

This event has not only erased enormous amounts of data, it has also created three distinct member types: elders, reborns and newcomers.

Reborns unite!

Together we'll overcome this and send Jeb off on his merry way once more!

I get knocked down....but I get up again.....

Huh... that should be the Kerbal soundtrack.
Beeing deleted too - but im resurrected now (with another username)
I need 5 posts to, so yes! I've got deleted! Anyway, I have got a new start!

For some reason, I'm not getting the moderatory block whenever I try to post, and my post count is currently under 5..

I also never got an email to confirm my registration, but I did contact help/support about it so maybe that's it...

Anyhow, yes I did get deleted. Keep calm and carry on.

My Account is still here, but i was lurking till recently 0 Posts baby!

Thank you squad for all your hard work. I know how much it sucks to find out your backups are corrupted, Nothing in the world like that feeling "We lost how much data?"
I was also wiped out in the great purge.

*** Poof, you are Reborn***

Drats, I came back as a frog, you know how long it took to find that princess the last time

I guess I can use the helmet as a pond on the long trips in space.
I was destroyed, but while the forums were down, I managed my first few modules of Space station.

Hopefully the remaining issues settle down.

They've been working on correcting known issues such as people not being removed from the queue correctly.
yep i did and only found out the forum wa s back because the gps mod was reposted with the updated forum link so thankies for that
I survived

Would be fun to know what the forum's elder/reborn ratio is, hehe.

Edited April 19, 2013 by Felsmak

Okay... the moderator really have to see through all posts.

@mod-who-reads-this haha xD

We suffer with you^^
reborn here but only 2 weeks i think
Yep, my account got deleted. An embuggerance, but not the end of the world. Hopefully I won't have to go through that "5 posts moderation" thing all over again.
Indeed, this was not the end of the world... But could you imagine the community uproar if they lost the store account information!? Let's count our blessings.
